fn.p: Competing Interests: The authors have declared that no competing interests exist.

Funding: This work was funded by the Institut Pasteur (ACIP grant A-08-2009) and the European Commission Framework Program Seven Award “InfraVec” (n 228421). FA was supported by the “Division International” of the Institut Pasteur. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
